titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to establish rules for payment for graduate medical education (GME) costs for hospitals that establish a new medical residency training program after hosting resident rotators for short durations.
Supporting Graduate Medical Education at Community Hospitals Act of 2018
Supporting Graduate Medical Education at Community Hospitals Act of 2018
Supporting Graduate Medical Education at Community Hospitals Act of 2018

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
